chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: Diary of Elizabeth Anne Jennings, later Anne Jennings Krush. Known to me and her other grandchildren as "Nanny." Her eldest daughter, Carol Krush, inherited all of Nanny's journals. Aunt Carol sent the journals to me in February, 2020.
This journal has an interesting set-up; one page for each day of the year, but with lines allowing entries for the same day on four different years.

listitem.para: 1931 - Wednesday. Met Peggy on train. Hot? Oh boy! Mignon & Nadine awfully nice. Swam as soon as we got here. Mosquitoes.
1932 - Fri. Waited around for John. Arrived while we were at Club. Ushered at Edgeworth Club benefit. Dance with Jim C. (Joey came.) Chocolate Shop, also Jim F & Sally. Fire & home about 2:30.

1933 - Sat. Up at 10. Ordered etc. Read. Washed stockings after lunch. Sat with Bill till Jim, Sally, Dan & I went to Windwood. Rain. Bill here when we got back. Also tonite. Bill leaves for Chicago! Sally & I (?) tonite. Gang. Bridge. Read. Mac home. Better we hope.

1934 - Sun. Up at 10. Bill here, also Lou, & John's two guests - Merrit Raley & Sis Brechin. Good guys. Bill cross at cocktail. To Bab's in aft & home. Sleep. Supper & John Keeney here. He's o.k. Read. Talked to young men. Bed!!

1935 - Mon. Saw Bill but queer, di! Then a full day at the hospital. Helped Dr. Stock again with media. 38 urines!! Jabbed a colored boy! Then home on train with Bill & more like himself & myself! Came this evening & was swell. Then Jim Crooks appeared & was very nice. He is awfully nice, di! But Bill left. I don't understand him!! And oh gosh, di - I love him so much. But there's no use in getting upset or anything.
1931 - Thursday. Got up at 8:30. had a grand time. Rowed, paddled, swam. Sun bath over at Annex. Got all wet. Tired now.
1932 - Sat. Up late. Down to Sally's in aft. Scotchy there. Fan belt broke. Movies in town tonite with Jim F, Sally, & Joey. "Hollywood." Good! Home. Joey stayed. Left late. Bed.
1933 - Sun. Up to late for church. Washed & ironed & got down for dinner. Peach ice cream. Rain. Dan & Jim here till supper time. Bill gone! Wally & Sally & I walked up street for cones. Read. Bed.

1934 - Mon. I guess Bill's mad. Saw cycle at Terry's as I drove to s. school. Dr. McKinley swell. Met Janet Slece, Bill ? & Martha Burns. Histology to be good. Home & stayed with Munny tonite. Washed hair. Bed. Got marks - 4 B's & 2 C's. 2 surprises & 2 disappointments.

1935 - Tues. Walked to station with Bill. Said he didn't want to cut in on Jim, the meany! Saw autopsy on syphilitic colored body. Not so bad. Beautiful syphilitic brain! Messed around. Home on 5 with Bill. It was fun, di. Then Babs & Terry came to talk about the affair demain soir. Munny & I together & bed 11:30!! Missed Bill, but wot the 'ell (?), I, shouldn't, I guess, see him all the time.
1931 - Friday. Swam. Rowed to Shield's Bay with Leta & Phil. Have a terrible sunburn now. Rowed alone also Nadine.
1932 - Sun. To Episcopal church with Aunt Nellie. Bill, Wally here. Slept all afternoon on account of intestine trouble. Joey here tonite. 2nd RFH & we had a keen time. Bed & Mr. Conneely (?)
1933 - Mon. Got my marks! All B's. Maybe I wasn't thrilled! Shirley's bridge-luncheon. More fun. Met Kate Bingham & Miriam â€¦. Jim came after. S & I saw cute movie. "A Woman's Possession." Dan here.
1934 - Tues. 2nd day of work. Forgot my scalpel. Messed around. Got out early. Home. Rested. Dance tonite with Dan. To Franny's afterwards & ate & messed around. Dan peculiar. Bed 2:30. Tired.

1935 - Wed. Up on train with Bill. Not such a busy day. Home on 5 & Ginny R. brot us home. Then the big affair opening of bar. Franny, Terry, Babs, Charlotte, Bea, Walter, Bill, Dan & Joey. Fun. A couple got sick. I went up near the end & Bill & I sat alone for a while. I felt the influence! Babs here all nite. Bed about 3!
1931 - Saturday. Got up late. Rowed with Nadine. Incident of pajamas. Movies at Carling tonite Bed at 1:30. Went woodsing.
1932 - Mon. Wakened by firecrackers. Joey here in aft. Then he & Wally & firecrackers. Gang for supper. Franny's with Sally. Home & sewed & bed.
1933 - Tues. Up late. Read. Jim here & I worked. Picnic with VanPelts this eve. Fun! To M.W.'s. Home. Read. Bed. Fine - 1:30. Bomb. Huge blaze. Mr. Tallman & Austin. Met Chubby. Darling as ever.

1934 - Wed. My, the 4th! Bill here & I couldn't go to Washington. Damn. Isabill & I went to ball game this aft. Pirates lost. Dan, Babs, Wally & I at Merrill's tonite. (Bill rode by) Watched fireworks from hill. Bed 12.

1935 - Thurs. a holiday! Up at 10 with Babs. Huge bekbets. Bill came about 1 & stayed till 5. Talked & he moved radio upstairs. Then, down on (?) & he was sweeter & grander than ever. But he said & I thot that we shouldn't do this very often. Rested. Dinner. Wally in , but I couldn't go to Babs! Messed around.
1931 - Sunday. Slept late. Over at Annex & sat. Picnic supper on porch. Rowed in evening.

1932 - Tues. Up late. Stockings. Wally & puzzle. Saw Franny. Swimming with Sally, Charles McC., Wally, Babs, Joey & Fred. Met Chubby. Darling. Swam a bit. Again I like him! Fooled this evening. No one.
1933 - Wed. Up late. Took Dammuddy & Aunt Nellie to town. Shopped. Home. Bath. Cleaned up. Tennis this evening with Dan, Sally & Jim. More fun. Movies. Jim Crooks, Polly & us. Ate here. Bed.

1934 - Thurs. Dan & Babs & I to town in a.m. Shopped. Met for lunch. To school. Worked on slides. Took Janet down & stopped at Hornes for Challis. Home. Babs & I cooked dinner. More fun! Ride & home & bed early.

1935 - Fri. Walked to station & to town with Sir Bill. Another autopsy today, 9 mo. old colored boy - pneumonia. Dr. Stock very peculiar. Then home on train with Bill. He couldn't go to movies on account of boating, so Babs, Waller & I to see "Escapade" with Bill Powell & a new girl - Good! To Babs for whissey(?). Home at 1 & was I tired?!!
1931 - Monday. Peggy's birthday, gave her hankies. Picnic supper on Annex. Went for a row.

1932 - Wed. Up! Messed around. Picnic at Windwood with Jim F, Sally, & Jim C. Sally ill. Got sunburn. Home 6:30. Wally & Joey came & worked on Xword puzzles. Joey stayed after Wally went. Left about 12.
1933 - Thurs. Up late. Got picnic stuff ready. Left about 3. McConnells Mills - Wally, Babs, Jim, Sally, Dan & I. Car trouble. Rapids. Pickles, Ice cream. Rasputin. Slow ride home. Tired & happy.

1934 - Fri. And still no Bill. Kept late at school because of those d. slides. Pop home. Munny & Pop in bad humor. They left. I packed etc & bed early 'cause we have to get up early in the a.m. Off to see Dammuddy.

1935 - Bill, his father & I drove up. Bill funny, but (?) nice to me! Then work. Back to town & shopped. Then lunch. Home Bathed. Bridged at Sarah's with Terry & Babs also. Home. No Bill tonite & I was awfully disappointed. German & bed early.
1931 - Tuesday. Nadine's last nite here. Played fooey Hide & Seek. Girls went bathing after Marshmellow roast at nite.
1932 - Thurs. Up late. Brunch. Town to baseball game. Pirates lost 4-3, but good game. Dinner at William Penn with Eke & Mun! I drove. Rain. Home. Joey here. Stayed till 10:30. He was tired.

1933 - Fri. Tennis this a.m. Fooled in aft. Betty Dunsford's for dinner with John & A. Lousy time till Bill came late. Fun then. He was disgusted tho, I guess. Gosh darn, diary. I like him an awful lot!

1934 - Sat. Up at 5 & left for Carlisle. Arrived at 12. Munny & I to see Dammuddy. Weaker but rational. Rested. Munny & Pop & I went back again. A bit better. Johnstons & Aunt Nellie for dinner. Fun. Bed early. Rain, but still hot!

1935 - Sun. Up at 9. Bill came about 10 - the bum! But at least he asked me to a picnic Sat. Then said he might come back, but didn't. Oh me! But he wasn't at Terry's! Did German. Called up Babs. Listened to Amateur Hour. Then Pop left. Bed about 11. 'Nite!
1931 - Wednesday. Got my marks. Dagnabit! First nite in tent. Nadine left. Boohoo. Rowed & read. Airplane. Sail-boat ride. Mrs. Sheaffer came. Very nice.
1932 - Fri. Up at 10. Got C.B. marks. Munny furious. Town with M.W. Missed Aunt Hat. Shopped. Home. Tennis. M.W.'s for supper. Fooled. Munny called as Joey here. Stayed till 12:30. Did puzzle.

1933 - Sat. Bill here this a.m. Didn't think he'd come. Awfully nice. M.W's bridge & tea this aft. Fun! Jim & Sam Semione, Johnny Mayer, Charlotte, S. & I to town & saw Clark Gable in "Hold Your Man" O.K.

1934 - Sun. Up & said G'bye to Dammuddy. Sad! Old age, di! It's tough to think of. Home at 6:15 & Bill here. I was taken aback. But he left. Fight with Munny. Merrils & bridge. Walking home & Bill came along. Talked. Then home - bed 12:30. Ain't love awful?

1935 - Mon. Up on train with Bill. Had to work quite hard today. Dr. Stock & I made Media. Steam in kitchen took it all out of me. Then home. Met Helen Trout. O.K. Then home to Babs' After movie in Ambridge "Oil for the Lamp of China" Good. Bed late.
1931 - Thursday. Walt Coles' family came. Bertha nice. Rowed with Mignon & Peggy to Footes Bay. No mail. Boohoo.
1932 - Sat. (I'm mixed up) Joey came tonite & we went to Street Fair. I won a cute lamp. No rides. Walked. Home & Xword puzzle until late.

1933 - Up late. Bill came before dinner. Ice cream. Here all afternoon. Cute. Wally had me embarrassed. Legs on pillow. Dan came. Supper. Dan & Jim & Shirley & M.W. & Jim's friends in tonite. Hilarious.
1934 - Town at break of dawn - 9 a.m. & worked at school 6 Â½ hrs. running up some tissue. Mistake - I guess. I stayed home & moped about. Wrote a couple of letters etc. Nuts!

1935 - Tues. Babs & I up & to work. Drove up with Bill. Lunch in Pittsburgh with Sally Hall. Betty drove us down. Home. Dressed. Bill & I to Babs. Dinner. Trout. Dan, Walter, Babs, Terry, Jane, Bill & me. Fun. Played Monopoly - Fooled. Bed late!
1931 - Friday. The Cole's left. Bob & Harry went to Gravenhurst & didn't get back. We miss them. Gibby is only man now.
1932 - Sun. To Sunday School. Walked home with Bill. Nice. M.W. over in aft. Talked. Got supper. Joey came. Took M.W. home. Movies in Ambridge. Home. Talked. Munny mad. Bed.

1933 - Mon. Had hair-cut. Tennis. Awful Sam Simons. Town with S. & lunch with Mary South, M. Singleton & J. Griffith. Fun. Move "King of Jazz." "Looking Forward" Dan & Jim here tonite. Franny came. Movies. Tea. Bed.
1934 - Tues. Lunch early & town early. Again worked long time in lab. Not so long as yesterday. I miss Bill these days. Mended a bit in the a.m. & cleaned up room. With Munny tonite & bed early.

1935 - Wed. Up & walked home in bedroom slippers for shoes. Then up on train with Bill. Stayed in after work. Dinner at Stouffers with Trout, Terry & Babs, then Stanley. "People Will Talk." Charlie Ruggles & Mary Boland & at last home.
1931 - Saturday. Boys didn't arrive till late. We went rowing & swimming. No sun.
1932 - Up & played tennis with M.W. in a.m. Won. Fooled in aft. Hair cut & waved. Down to Sally's after supper. Saw Chubby at Isaly's. Sally & I to bed early after Street Fair. Read story. Bed.

1933 - Tues. S & I to Crutchfields for lunch. Awfully nice on porch. Ottie had bridge & tea at the Club in aft. Loads of fun. Jim Pullman(?) & Dan here tonite & we had croquet & then bridge. Bed late.
1934 - Wed. Lunch early & worked 4 hrs in lab today. Loads of fun but patience needed. Dan, Wally, Babs & I to Warner to see "Lets Try Again" & "Cockeyed Cavaliers." Fun. Home. Ice cream & cake.

1935 - Thurs. Up on train with Bill. Then to work. Did a lot of urines. Then helped Dr. Stock most of rest of day. He drove me home. Then thot I'd go to bed early, but Jim came & stayed till a little after 10. Then bed! John home tomorrow!! Be glad to see him!!
1931 - Sunday. Got up to go to church, but no one went. We read. "Jane Eyre" is good. I cried over sad part.
1932 - Tues. Up at 10:45. Fooled with Sally till lunch. Tennis with M.W. Won. Movies tonite with Joey. "Letty Lynton." Good. Bent fender. Ice cream twice. Joey, Wally & I talked. Bed 12:30.

1933 - Wed. No tennis as expected. Worked & fooled around. To Franny's bridge party tonite with Dan. Keen. Pink dress. Bill there. Danced 3 times. Grand. I love his dancing! Ride. Sam S. followed. Fun! Bill yelled. Bed late.

1934 - Thurs. To town to dentist. Bill here while I in town. (Bitter) Worked 4 hrs. Dr. McKinley no longer likes me. Bill Jetter came for a talk after I had finished a letter & was listening to Rudy. Bed 10:30.

1935 - Fri. Another hard day of work. Helped Dr. Stock again & fun ! Missed Bill on train & thot it may be he's sick. But he came tonite. Yes, di, he came & I had to go to Merril's for bridge. Fight with family about car & I was ashamed of myself after so many dresses, hat, etc. and so home late & to bed & I was miserable. I missed a night with Bill & Monopoly & Jane was there & I had that fight. Oh gosh, di - what is the use?
1931 - Monday. Harry has fallen for Mignon. Tonite we all went rowing. It certainly was funny but I'm crazy about that boy!

1932 - Wed. Up & played tennis with M.W. in a.m. Swimming at Camp Horne(?) in aft. Neatzy! Movies "Careless Lady" with Joey tonite. Grand! To Fair. Ride on Heydey. Met with Wally. Home & talked. Walked to Chale & saw Chubby in white linen suit!

1933 - Thurs. Had to get up early to no avail. S & I went to Betty Terry's bridge this aft. Loads of fun except for Ottie & Mugs Miller. (Bill has been here). Wally, Bill Jetter, Dan here tonite. Bridge. Fight. Hair (?) 1st movie with Dammuddy's crowd. "Secrets" Good.

1934 - Fri. Town & dentist again. Filled teeth. Ate lunch with Jane Griffith. Fun. Out to school. Janet not there. Worked hard. Babs & I got dinner. Then Wally & Dan came. We all saw "Sadie McKee" at movies. Cute. Back to Babs' & messed about.

1935 - Sat. Oh what a time. Bill & I up in C.G's car & then work. Finally thru & home. After much discussion etc, picnic with Richardsons & Bill Murdock & Miss Reed at McConnell's Mills. Home after grand time & Monopoly up at Richardsons. Home. 11 & then to bed. Oh gosh, di - I love him so much, but always the business of Jane etc. What to do!!
1931 - Tuesday. Went woodsing in morning & swimming this afternoon.
1932 - Thurs. Messed around in a.m. Swimming with M.W. & Sally in aft at Camp Horne. Dance there with Jim Crooks tonite. Awfully nice. Home & bed late.

1933 - Fri. Worked around. Munny & Eke arrived at 2! Whoops! Tea at Noakers. Fun. Also tea at Bricky's awful nice. Sally to dance with Dan Miller. Dan here for a minute. Bill & Joey here. Bill darling! Joey stayed.
1934 - Sat. Up early. Worked. No Bill. I'm discouraged about this point. Movies with Isabill "30 Day Princess." Darling. Shirley there. Isabill & I ride & talked for hours. Home. Late dinner. Bed.

1935 - Sun. Up at 10. Read & Bill came about 11 & stayed till 5:30. Charlotte & Walter also here for a while. Crazy. We all felt lazy. Then Bill & I talked & read magazines. he's so swell, di. I dunno. I shouldn't keep saying it, I guess! John arrived about 8 & brot Peg Mitchell. My first impression was very good. I like here a lot. John is certainly in love. What fun. Listened to radio - bed early.
1931 - Wednesday. Doris, Franky & Walt left. We girls drove to Bracebridge. (Peggy stalled 2). Misses Porter & Baldwin came.

1932 - Fri. Up late. Brunch. Circus! Nertzy. Got a chameleon. Movies "Huddle" with M.W. Her place all nite. Guild Hall struck by lightning. Big fire. Joe Cook talked to me. Saw Joey or "Curls." Bed. Nervous.

1933 - Sat. Town with M.W., Franny, S. Lunch & "Storm at Daybreak." Good. Dance at Shannopin tonite with Dan. More fun fighting. Silly. Last dance with Bill. Divine! "Lone Wolf." Dan loving! Breakfast at Babs. John et. Bridge. Bed 4.

1934 - Sun. Up early & fixed up house. Bill came as I ate bekbets. And then Wally. Nary a chance for a talk. Jane & K Cuthbert, Wally, Bill here for dinner. Swimming with Wally & Babs. Dan came later & bridge at Merrills. Fun!

1935 - Mon. Hard to get up & go to work. But did. Worked like Hell. Mrs. Hap & Ki in for a while tonite. Bill also. But he left when the eclipse of the moon started. It was good. Mom & I watched till after midnite. Bed & tired.
1931 - Thursday. Put pepper in boys' beds & fixed pajamas. Went to movies & saw "3 Faces East." Dumb. Harry took Honey & I was lonely.

1932 - Sat. Up at 8:30. Still excited! Home. Washed hair, stockings. Sewed. Bill here! Street Fair with Sally & family. Keen. Saw Chubby! Cute! Full moon, but no Joey. Came home from Sally's. Bed early.

1933 - Sun. Up hideously late. Sally packed. Gang here to say G'bye. Bill awfully nice on porch! We all rode to town. Sally off - darn it! Dan, Bill, M.W. & I bridge tonite. Fun. Bed early. Mrs. Townsend called up & I'm to go to Canada Tues. or Thurs! Whoops!
1934 - Mon. Up early. Mess of dishes. Town. Took Dan & Clare Nevin. Worked. Lunch with Dan. He was awful nice! Work again. Brot Clare & Challis home. Mom 'n' Pop 'n' I fun tonite.

1935 - Tues. Up on train with Bill. Quite a day at the lab. Worked. Lunch in kitchen. Home in (?) Then, after dinner Bill n I sought elderberry blossoms, came home & peeled them. Then he left. We talked di, all about men & women - very illuminating. Munny & I up & to bed after a talk.
1931 - Friday. Mignon & Harry together all day. I got homesick tonite with noting to do. Better now. Harry taught Peggy & me diving.
1932 - Sun. To S.S. with Sally. Home. Read. M.W., Franny & I to Pinx's in aft. Met Gerry. Cute. To M.W's for supper. Good. Shirley came. Sang & home late. Joey had been here & gone. Oh dear!
1933 - Mon. Bill came after I got home from town shopping. Darling! Played horse shoes. He had to leave. Said G'bye to me! Oh dear! M.W & I horsed around tonite. Ran into gang at Legion fair.
1934 - Tues. Up early. Baked a gingerbread, not bad. School & last day of making slides. Home a mite late & got supper with Munny. Bed early. Getting late now. (I miss Bill!!)

1935 - Wed. Up & to station & train with Bill. I was (?) today but worked hard. Then home on 5 with Bill. He came for dinner. Munny in Washington. We fixed elderberry blossoms. Then we were together on C.C. (T.L. di & only) - I hereby vow to always, only, and never anyone but Bill. He was so nice, di & we had a grand talk. Someday we will!! Oh gosh di. Did that slip or did he mean it? I hope so! I'd never want to marry anyone else! --so help me!
1931 - Saturday. Mignon left. Boo hoo! Harry, Peggy & I are lonesome. I got ducked with my clothes on by Bob. Glasses broken, but no other damage.
1932 - Mon. Down to Sally's & sewed pajamas! Stayed for lunch. Swam at Camp H with Bill, Sally, Fred & Sam Fader. Fun. Movies at Cosy with Joey tonite. Station. "Nice Women." Home. Left early.
1933 - Tues. M.W. & I rode around this aft. Ran out of gas. Date with Dan tonite. He & Babs & Wally & I to movies. "Eagle & the Hawk." Good. Home. Bridge. OK. Dan's right nice, but Bill! Oh dear!
1934 - Wed. Sunned in a.m & Bill came. I hardly ever see him now. Talked a while & then left. School. Worked on study of slides. What fun. Home & talked with Munny & bed early. Cool.

1935 - Thurs. Kept thinking of yesterday all day & worried a bit. Drove up & back with Bill. Town with Sally Hall at noon. Bill in & out. Then down to Joey's & tennissed. Sets 3-6; 3-6;8-6. Fun! Movies "Naughty Marietta" - again. Good. Home late. Joey's so cute & just as nice as can be.
1931 - Sunday. Sailboated with Pardow's in a.m. Read & in aft got aqua-plane & went for rides. Swam tonite in nature's clothes!

1932 - Tues. Up & to Sally's & sewed on pajamas. To Pinx's in aft for bridge. Sally's this evening. Home. Jim Crooks, Wally & Joey here. Wally stayed on. Then old meany. Bed early & fixed you, diary! Bill here at noon. Real nice about dance.

1933 - Wed. Packed. Munny, Eke, Wally & I to double-header this aft. Won 1 & lost 1. Great! Home late. Supper. Off to New Brighton with Wally & Babs. Saw Weedy(?) & Bob. Be off tomorrow! Dammuddy & Aunt Nellie left. Sad.

1934 - Thurs. A bit more sun in a.m. Town in aft. Harry Litman very nice. Seminar - Good. Or rather dumb. To Babs' tonite. Bridge. Marg Campbell, B. Terry. Dumb. Dan came. Wally late & Wally's first day of work.

1935 - Fri. Up on train with Bill. So nice, di. Worked hard all day. Punched a couple of kids for blood. Found out Dr. Stock's engaged!! Home with Bill n Charlotte. Great rain. Munny met me. No Bill tonite.. down to Emerys & great fun, really , bridging. Home. Ice cream with Katy. Bed early. Letter from Prill! Tomorrow??
1931 - Monday. Tonite we were to go for ride, but Peggy & I hid. Naughty! I wrote letters & fooled around.
1932 - Wed. Stayed home. Rested. Washed hair. Bathed. Read. Dance at "Pines" with Jim Crooks tonite. Scotchy & Sally. More fun. Intense heat! Home 1:30. Oh me. Gingerale.

1933 - Thurs. Up early. Met Judd Youtes. He & I drove. I very little. He is awfully nice, but that's about all I can say. Drove all day. (?) & Mrs. Townsends. More darn fun. Got to Onillia at 10 & stayed here all night.
1934 - Fri. School on time. Awful punching of fingers for blood. Dan, Franny, Jim & I to Lib Crampton's and dance at Club. Too hot. Ride. Home. ate. Fooled & finally bed a bit late.

1935 - Sat. Drove to work with Bill. Morning flew by. Then home & Munny had 2 dresses for me! Then Bill, Bert, Dan, Babs, Marion Sarchet & I picnic to McConnells Mills. Loads of fun. Sun great. Back to Babs about 8. Home 10. Bill, Bert & I gingerale & cake. They left early. Bed & now am I tired?!!
1931 - Tues. Drove to Bracebridge got candy etc. Swam & sewed in aft. Tonite, Harry (dear boy) paddled & took P & me for ride in Idyllook!!!
1932 - Thurs. Took Dammuddy & Aunt Nellie to station. Home. Luncheon in honor of Jerry & Pinx. Swimming. Fun. Home. Wally, Joey, Sally & Scotchy here tonite. Fun & bed 12! & you!
1933 - Fri. Up early. Breakfast in Orillia. On to Footes Bay. Arrived noon. Peggy & Betty swell. Met Marian Murray - "Chico." Betty & Judd (?) He's young, but nice. Good old Muskoka. Swimming, etc.
1934 - Sat. Oh for a year ago! Hot as blazed. Cleaned bar. Franny's for bridge party with Babs. Loads of fun. Dan, Babs & I to "Operator 13" tonite & got Wally. Bar cool & we talked. Bed 1:20

1935 - Sun. up at 10. Bill came about 11:30 & stayed till 5:30. New Palm Beach suit & he looked awful nice. Read etc. Lazy day. He still hasn't mentioned Jane, di, but I got him worried. I still don't think Mother likes the idea. It hurts so, di, because she doesn't like any of my friends & I don't know what she thinks about Bill. The only thing she likes is that I'm in college. It makes me feel simply lousy & almost awful whenever I think if it, di. But it's no good to change I can't - so help me!!
1931 - Wednesday. Rose at 8:45. Cleaned shoes etc.
1932 - Fri. Swim at Camp Horne this aft with Sally, Joey & Mary Wells. Fun. Home. Fixed for supper. Buffet supper. Franny, Sally, M.W. & I & boys. Keen. Dance at E Club. Ride. Home. 3,4,5 HFH.
1933 - Sat, Swan a kit, Great to be here. Expected to go to dance but didn't. Fun tonite with Judd, our Sultan. His harem. Sill as heck. Oh dear. Bed late.
1934 - Sunday. Up early. Bill came again. Don (?) Stayed for quite a time & we talked. More like old times. Supposed to have date with Dan tonite but he didn't come. Swell! Oh me. Read till late.

1935 - Mon. To & on train with Bill. Walked across bridge. Worked all day, hard. Gosh, I love it, di! Punched another kid for blood. Home on 5 with Charlotte. Franny & I to movies after lost supper with Pop. HC leaves for Calif. Saw "No More Ladies." Bill had been here. He went to movies & came back & we had another swell talk, on many subjects. Pop left & 'twas sad, 3 whole weeks!! Bill stayed till 11:45. We fixed porch & then he kissed me G'nite & I love him so much!! I can't help it!!
1931 - Thursday. Believe it or not. I was in Canada & I wish I were there now swimming because I am hot. July 21, 1932 12 P.M.! Rain & a little relief! Oh me!

1932 - Sat. Up again will & played tennis with M.W, Conant Buckmaster & Rinehart Thieson. Riney & I won. Took boys to town. To see Aunt Hat. Not home. Movies tonite with Joey. "Mouthpiece." 6K FH Oh me!
1933 - Sun. Great day. Sailed this aft with Bill Steele, Chico, Judd & Betty. Storm. Stayed at Steeles. Supper. Swim. Horse-shoes. More storm. Everybody worried. Search. Home at last.
1934 - Mon. Up & to school early today. Messed around. Cleaned house, too. Babs & I cooked dinner for Munny. To Walkers for dark cow. Down to bowl. Dan out. Home. Bed early.

1935 - Tues. To station & train with Bill. Then record of 74 urines today. Did a couple of bloods & counts. Present today & I was glad, but early! Home on 5. Bill & Charlotte. Then called Babs & I was dead tired & couldn't go to Rickey's. But Bill came. Munny & he read & I did German - till 10. Then we talked till 11:15. He lay on my lap! Kissed me g'nite again & it all seems deeper than ever. Di - I'm really happy again!
1931 - Friday. Big fight with H. Peggy & I were ruined after nearly being thrown in lake. "Hot & Cold."
1932 - Sun. Up very late. Bill & Joey here. To Mary-Wells's in aft. Fun. She came for supper, also Joey. We all went to Ambridge to movies. "Case of Clara Deane." Good. Home. She stayed all nite!
1933 - Mon. Honey arrived. All went to party at Marg Wheatons. Swam. Ate. Played Ping Pong. Home late. Played bridge tonite. Bed late.

1934 - Tues. Tennis with Wally in a.m. He beat me 7-5. Lesson & town. Nasty policeman yelled. Isabel & Catherine Clark rode in with me. Babs' grandmother died. Sad. Wally & I to see Babs. Little ride. Home. Bed.

1935 - Wed. Drove up today. To Hornes to be fitted at noon. Then, Franny, Bill & I home. M.S. home & called up! Bill & I to Stanley to see Grace Moore in "Love Me Forever." Good. Home. Munny & he & I read. Then we sat on Pops chair & again we were naughty. But, ok di, it makes us love him all the more. I love him so much, I could just die!! Nit, di!!!
1931 - Saturday. Misses Baldwin & Porter left. Frankie & Walt back. Stayed up till 10:30. H. pushed me in lake 2 times, but not with clothes.
1932 - Mon. Up & took crowd to Dravo's for swim. Back to MW's for lunch - bridge. Almost won booby! Home. Movies "As You Desire Me" with Joey, Sally & her mother. He stayed till 11:30. I'm dead!
1933 - Tues. Up late. Cleaned path to Nellies. Fun. Went aquaplaning with Gubby this aft. Couldn't get up 1st time. About ruined. Fun. Tea. Monkeyed tonite.

1934 - Wed. Helped clean house in a.m. Tennis with Franny. Beat her 6-2. Town. Tonite Babs & her cousins. Don & I took Jim S. to town & showed it off. Stouffers for drinks. Babs better tonite. Home. Bed late.

1935 - Thurs. Train with Bill. Then to work & Uncle Mose felt badly! Did a whole mess of blood punching & included Jean Dobbs the Strep meningitis! Then home on 5 with Bill. Saw Lou & Chubby!! Imagine! Up to M.W.'s. She is home. Went to movies in Ambridge. "The Woman is a Devil" Home Bed!! Tired!! So good to see M.W. She makes me restless, but I'll always like her terribly much!!
1931 - Sunday. Swam in morning & aft. Finished Ariel by Maurois. Piddled around in evening. Ride & Harry's darned silliness Phlt.
1932 - Tues. Down to Sally's & sewed. There for lunch. Town & shopped with M.W., Sally & her mother. Home. Movies "Dark Horse" in Ambridge with M.W. & Dossie. Home. Bed early & you!
1933 - Wed. Swam all a.m. This aft Phyl & I swam from sand bar home. Swam all around. Bridge tonite. Lou Campbell, Sam Fader & Henry Nevin tonite.
1934 - Thurs. Worked on house. Then town early to work. Next to last day! Swimming tonite at McKnights with Franny, Babs, Wally, Don & Joey. Here for eats. Talked. They left early & I bedded early.

1935 - Fri. Up on train with Bill & said G'bye to him. Worked hard. Saw an autopsy on a baby girl - 11 mo. who had co(?) & broxcho-pneumonia. Got blood etc. Then Munny came & we were off to Carlisle at 3:30 or so. Arrived 10. Talked with Aunt Nellie. Then to hotel & bed.
1931 - Monday. Washed clothes. Down to Carling in aft to regatta. Fun with H. He's a dear. Had a ride in one of Gravette's speedboats. Fun.
1932 - Wed. Down to Franny's. Swim in rain & luncheon at her house. Fun. Supper at Mary Wells's. Strip Poker. Bed early. Read fooled & ate. Sleep late & dead tired! Sewed hem on her dress!
1933 - Thurs. Present. Mignon & I paddled to Arma. Rowed around in aft. Played bridge tonite & learned a lot (I hope). Ate in kitchen & to bed late.

1934 - Fri. Up early. Town early & finished work. Dan in for a min. Janet, Don, Murphy, Joe F. & I lunch at Isaly's. Fooled. Sprinkler. Test. 2 wrong out of 25. Joe 1 wrong. To Janet's Tea. Fun. Home. Letters. Pa home. Bed early.

1935 - Sat. Up. Breakfast at Molly Pitcher. Munny & I got Aunt Nellie & took her to Hershey. Quite a grand place. Mom loved the snakes at the zoo. Then to Johnstons tonite for dinner. Awful nice but Jean is (?) Talked & then back - left Aunt Nellie. She is so nice, di! I hope Iâ€™ll be as nice as she if I live that long!
1931 - Tuesday. Went to Carling. Saw "Father's Son." Rode home in rumble with H. We talked whole way. He certainly is interesting. Movie good.

1932 - Thurs. Down to sew on pajamas in a.m. after M.W. & I rose. Lunch at home. Town with Sally, M.W. & Franny. S & I to Aunt Hat's for supper. Home. Joey & Wally here. John, too. Sally & I to bed at 11. Admitted to Wellesley. Whoppie!
1933 - Fri. Fooled on Lock in a.m. Winslow's picnic this aft. More fun. Paddled. Lovely little island. Good supper. Home late after much fun.

1934 - Sat. Up at 4:45. Off to Carlisle. Pop in a huff at first. Dammuddy much better! Will be able to come home in about a week. Nice visit. Aunt Nellie for dinner. She's a swell guy! Bed early. Dead tired!

1935 - Sun. Up at 8:30. Over to Mooreland & said G'bye to Aunt Nellie. Mom n I drove on home. Got here about 5:30. Bill supposed to come but didn't. German & Jim came. Joey & Walley also (?) the evening & played Monopoly & watta game! Missed Bill, oh so much!! - 2 days now!
1931 - Wednesday. Gubby worked on steps. Bum job.

1932 - Fri. Sally & I up late. Finished pajamas. John to hospital & had operation for appendicitis. Getting along fine. Poor kid! Messed around. Joey here. Left early. Fixed college schedule. Letter to Jim & you!
1933 - Sat. Went to unexpected dance tonite after Lon was here to see Chico in the aft. Stuck with Hank & had a grand time. Home & sherry refreshed us. Bed about 2.

1934 - Sun. Saw Dammuddy. Wandered a bit. Said G'bye, also to Aunt Nellie. Came on home. Mom 'n' Pop 'n' I. Arrived about 6. Dan & date forgot to show up. He's nuts. Bill had been here at noon. Oh me. 'Nite.

1935 - Mon. Met Bill & Lou at station up on train. Worked hard today. Did all urines alone! Helped also with blood. Home with Bill. Then he & I fixed elderberry wine. Aliquippa. Louise & about Terrys. Oh gosh di! And then, Munny to Uncle Sams at 10 & till 11:15 when Pop called, all was too sublime. We were naughty but that Philosophy about youth only once etc!! I hope we can always be naughty without being evil. He left at 11:40 & then me to bed & I think he's too grand, di! 'Nite.
1931 - Thursday. Dance at Casino of Cleveland House. Bob best dancer. H & Walt nice, too. Hard time getting there. Discussion about nature etc on way home.

1932 - Sat. Up early to see John. Getting along fine. Worked around. Bill here. Real nice on porch. He & Wally & I chocolate milkshakes. Joey & I to Cory station & movies "It's Tough to Be Famous." Movie good. Home. Bed late. Tired!
1933 - Sun. Up late. Brunch. Steele boys came this aft & stayed for dinner. Met Glenn Wilton , Murray's brother. Lou Campbell was around to see Chico. Horse-shoes. Punt Archery. Dancing. Bed late.

1934 - Mon. New course - Embryology today. Promises to be good. Five of us now. 3 boys & 2 girls. One boy asked me to show him to book store. He's awfully nice. Comes from Steubenville. Nicest one yet. Babs, Wally, Dan & I bridge tonite. Bed 1.

1935 - Tues. My I felt lousy today. Stomach trouble & diarrhea but I went to work. Bill so sweet about everything. Then worked pretty hard. Did 3 counts & took the blood entirely alone. Home & felt lousy; so bed at 7:30 for about 12 hrs sleep. 'Nite!
1931 - Friday. Drove down to Gravenhurst with Walt, Frankie, Peggy & Weeze. Others left us. Fun rowing! Ate lunch at Orillia. Bot pants. Oodles of fun. Walt is a peach.
1932 - Sun. Up real late. Bill here. Also Wally. Bill cute. Saw John in aft. Better. Joey here. John again in eve. Sally, Joey & I chocolate milkshakes. Bed early. Hair wash. Sore throat.
1933 - Mon. Sun bathed & washed socks all morning. Out again this aft. Lou took Chico to dance tonite. We all fooled around, pitched horse-shoes, etc. Drank more sherry. Good.

1934 - Tues. Worked on dress. To school & still didn't learn the new boy's name. I don't know whether or not I like him. Harry Lipman nice. Oh gosh, di - I miss Bill!!! Messed around tonite. Babs & Charlotte. Boys here.

1935 - Wed. Bill & I up in car to town. Felt refreshed. Asked him for his picture but don't know, di! Worked hard. Little Jean & Dobbs so cute! Home with Bill & he's so damn independent, di, about Friday! To M.W.'s for dinner & then she & Munny & I to club for to watch tennis. Munny joined the pool for me. She's so swell di, always doing such things, and so in love with Pops.
